name: Cortex
semantic_context: Apply the Cortex analyzer/responder on the given entity
natural_language_description: 这是 Cortex 节点。主要用于: Apply the Cortex analyzer/responder on the given entity

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: Choose a resource | 默认值: analyzer | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 作用: Choose an operation | 默认值: get | (必填项)

analyzer.name: analyzer
analyzer.description: Choose the analyzer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
analyzer.natural_language_description: 参数名: Analyzer Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose the analyzer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

observableType.name: observableType
observableType.description: Choose the observable type. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
observableType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Observable Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose the observable type. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

observableValue.name: observableValue
observableValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Observable Value | 作用: Enter the observable value | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

tlp.name: tlp
tlp.description: The TLP of the analyzed observable
tlp.natural_language_description: 参数名: TLP | 作用: The TLP of the analyzed observable | 默认值: 2

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: force (值: None) - Whether to force bypassing the cache
timeout (值: None) - Timeout to wait for the report in case it is not available at the time the query was made

responder.name: responder
responder.description: Choose the responder. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
responder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Responder Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose the responder. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

entityType.name: entityType
entityType.description: Choose the Data type. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
entityType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entity Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose the Data type. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

jsonObject.name: jsonObject
jsonObject.description: Choose between providing JSON object or seperated attributes
jsonObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 作用: Choose between providing JSON object or seperated attributes | 默认值: False

objectData.name: objectData
objectData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entity Object (JSON) | (必填项)

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parameters | 默认值: {}

jobId.name: jobId
jobId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Job ID | 作用: ID of the job | (必填项)
